parameters.name: AssetsIP
parameters.description: The IP address of the affected asset.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds. If you do not specify this parameter, the query ends at the current time.

parameters.name: EventKey
parameters.description: The ID of the breach awareness event.

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description: The name of the breach awareness event.

parameters.name: EventUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the breach awareness event.

parameters.name: IsIgnore
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the breach awareness event is ignored. Valid values:

*   **true**: The breach awareness event is ignored.
*   **false**: The breach awareness event is not ignored.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 6. Maximum value: 10.

parameters.name: ProcessStatusList
parameters.description: The handling status of breach awareness events.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds. If you do not specify this parameter, the query starts from 30 days before the current time.
